alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry, west central Knott and southwestern Breathitt Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lamont, or 11 miles northwest of Hazard, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Watts and Haddix around 525 PM EDT. Ned, Dice and Lost Creek around 530 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clayhole, Flintville, Hardshell, Smith Branch, Noble, Rowdy, Ary, Buck, Press, Wilstacy and Sikes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
